title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: Currently, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not having any effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not hide the item in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The display property of an item set to 'none' should hide the item in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Check if the item is not visible in the generated PDF.
